Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: The picture of miraculous creation of the Creator-God is full of wonder and awe. We cannot even describe the deeds of a small ant created by Him.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs isrjn hwr dI rcnw dy cilqR dw icqR iek sUKm ijhw jMqU kIVI hY, ijs ivKy ibsmwd nUM pRwpq krx hwrw AYsw Acrj pnwˆ hY jo mwno AMdroˆ bwhroˆ BOck ivc pOx hwrw hY AYho ijhw ik Es dy cilqR = cyStw vw kwrnwimAwˆ dI ibvsQw vÎoˆq kihx ivc nhIˆ Aw skdI[

lines.gurmukhi: pRQm hI cItI ky imlwp ko pRqwp dyKo; shs Anyk eyk ibl mY smwvhI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just see how thousands of ants get organised in a small burrow/hole.

lines.gurmukhi: AgRBwgI pwCY eykY mwrg clq jwq; pwvq imTws bwsu qhI imil DwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: All of them tread and walk on the same path that is defined by the leading ant. Wherever they smell sweetness, they all reach there.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Pyr j`QybMdI eynwˆ dI q`ko ik AgRBwgI j`Qydwr Agvwn kIVI dy ipCy ipCy TIk ieko hI rwh lIh isr qIAwˆ jwˆdIAwˆ hn, Aru suMGn dI smr`Qw BI vIcwro ik ijQoˆ ikqoˆ imTy dI sugMDI bU nUM BI pOˆdIAwˆ lKdIAwˆ hn, EDr nUM hI iml ky dOV pYˆdIAwˆ hn[

lines.gurmukhi: iBRMgI imil qwqkwl iBRMgI rUp huie idKwvY; cItI cItI icqR AlK icqyrY kq pwvhI [274[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Meeting an insect with wings, they adopt their life-style. When we are unable to know the wonders of a small ant, how can we know the super naturalness of the Creator who has created countless things in this universe? (274)
